alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 2:23PM EST until February 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Pickaway and Fairfield Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of rain and freezing rain is expected tonight and into the overnight hours. Ice accumulations are most likely in the northern sections of Pickaway and Fairfield counties.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iln as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
